name: iStockcheck
body:
### iPhone 7 availability checker
Select which iPhone 7 variants you are hunting for, and the U.K. Apple Stores to search in. iStockcheck runs in the background, checking for new iPhone 7 pickup availability every minute.

### Notifications
As soon as there is an available pickup slot, iStockcheck sends a notification. Additionally, leave iStockcheck running and receive notifications on your smartphone, via [Pushbullet](https://pushbullet.com) or [Telegram](https://telegram.org).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with iStockcheck? Contact @AndrewBennet, or raise an issue on the GitHub page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
